interface.name: Barrage
interface.summary: Barrage is a rather violent action game
interface.description: Barrage is a rather violent action game with the objective to kill and destroy as many targets as possible within 3 minutes. The player controls a gun that may either fire small or large grenades at soldiers, jeeps and tanks. It is a very simple gameplay though it is not that easy to get high scores. License: GPL Homepage: http://lgames.sourceforge.net
